trans-unit.source: Monitor MAM policies with Microsoft Intune | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Monitor MAM policies with Microsoft Intune | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: See how many users have the policy, drill down to find out more details.
trans-unit.target: See how many users have the policy, drill down to find out more details.

trans-unit.source: Monitor mobile app management policies with Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Monitor mobile app management policies with Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: After you have configured a MAM policy and applied it to the users, you can monitor the compliance status on the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: After you have configured a MAM policy and applied it to the users, you can monitor the compliance status on the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: The Azure portal includes information about the users affected by the policy, the compliance status, and any issues that your end users might be experiencing.
trans-unit.target: The Azure portal includes information about the users affected by the policy, the compliance status, and any issues that your end users might be experiencing.

trans-unit.source: Summary view
trans-unit.target: Summary view

trans-unit.source: On the **Intune mobile application management** blade you can see a summary of the compliance status as described below:
trans-unit.target: On the **Intune mobile application management** blade you can see a summary of the compliance status as described below:

trans-unit.source: Summary tile on the Intune mobile application management blade
trans-unit.target: Summary tile on the Intune mobile application management blade

trans-unit.source: **USERS:** The total number of users in your company who are using the apps that are associated with the policy.
trans-unit.target: **USERS:** The total number of users in your company who are using the apps that are associated with the policy.

trans-unit.source: **MANAGED BY POLICY:**- The number of users who have used at least one of the apps in the work context.
trans-unit.target: **MANAGED BY POLICY:**- The number of users who have used at least one of the apps in the work context.

trans-unit.source: **NO POLICY:** The number of users who are using the apps associated with the policy, but are not targeted by your policy.
trans-unit.target: **NO POLICY:** The number of users who are using the apps associated with the policy, but are not targeted by your policy.

trans-unit.source: You may consider adding these users to your policy.
trans-unit.target: You may consider adding these users to your policy.

trans-unit.source: **Flagged users:** The number of users experiencing issues.
trans-unit.target: **Flagged users:** The number of users experiencing issues.

trans-unit.source: Currently only users with jailbroken devices are reported under **Flagged users**.
trans-unit.target: Currently only users with jailbroken devices are reported under **Flagged users**.

trans-unit.source: Detailed view
trans-unit.target: Detailed view

trans-unit.source: You can get to the detailed view of the summary by clicking on the **User status** tile and the **Flagged users** tile.
trans-unit.target: You can get to the detailed view of the summary by clicking on the **User status** tile and the **Flagged users** tile.

trans-unit.source: User status
trans-unit.target: User status

trans-unit.source: You can search for a single user and look at the compliance status for that user.
trans-unit.target: You can search for a single user and look at the compliance status for that user.

trans-unit.source: The **App reporting** blade displays the following information for a selected user:
trans-unit.target: The **App reporting** blade displays the following information for a selected user:

trans-unit.source: Device(s) that are associated with the user account
trans-unit.target: Device(s) that are associated with the user account

trans-unit.source: App(s) with MAM policy on the device
trans-unit.target: App(s) with MAM policy on the device

trans-unit.source: Status:
trans-unit.target: Status:

trans-unit.source: **Checked in:** This means that the policy was deployed to the user, and app was used in work context at least once.
trans-unit.target: **Checked in:** This means that the policy was deployed to the user, and app was used in work context at least once.

trans-unit.source: **Not checked in:** This means the policy was deployed to the user, but app has not been used in the work context since then.
trans-unit.target: **Not checked in:** This means the policy was deployed to the user, but app has not been used in the work context since then.

trans-unit.source: If the user you searched for does not have the MAM policy deployed to them, you will see a message informing you that the user is not targeted for any app policies.
trans-unit.target: If the user you searched for does not have the MAM policy deployed to them, you will see a message informing you that the user is not targeted for any app policies.

trans-unit.source: To see the reporting for a user, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: To see the reporting for a user, follow these steps:

trans-unit.source: **Step 1:** To select a user, click on the Summary tile or choose the **APP REPORTING BY USER** option in the **Settings** blade as shown below:
trans-unit.target: **Step 1:** To select a user, click on the Summary tile or choose the **APP REPORTING BY USER** option in the **Settings** blade as shown below:

trans-unit.source: App reporting option on the settings blade
trans-unit.target: App reporting option on the settings blade

trans-unit.source: **Step 2:** This opens the **App reporting** blade.
trans-unit.target: **Step 2:** This opens the **App reporting** blade.

trans-unit.source: Choose **Select user** to search for an Azure Active Directory user.
trans-unit.target: Choose **Select user** to search for an Azure Active Directory user.

trans-unit.source: select user option on the App reporting blade
trans-unit.target: select user option on the App reporting blade

trans-unit.source: **Step 3:** After selecting the user from the list, you will see the details of the compliance status for that user.
trans-unit.target: **Step 3:** After selecting the user from the list, you will see the details of the compliance status for that user.

trans-unit.source: App reporting details
trans-unit.target: App reporting details

trans-unit.source: Flagged users
trans-unit.target: Flagged users

trans-unit.source: The detailed view displays the error message, the app that was accessed when the error happened, the platform of the device, and a time stamp.
trans-unit.target: The detailed view displays the error message, the app that was accessed when the error happened, the platform of the device, and a time stamp.

trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.target: [Manage data transfer between iOS apps](manage-data-transfer-between-ios-apps-with-microsoft-intune.md)
